instruction:
Suburban-Rural Map Reading

This section of the test contains multiple-choice questions, which you must answer by using your computer mouse to select the correct response. Upon answering a question, you can go to the next question by clicking the Next button on the Menu bar.

During this section of the test, if you choose you may skip an item and then later return to that item.

When you are finished, select Submit from the Menu bar. Your Test Administrator may have set a time limit for this test section. If there is a time limit, you will be told how much time you have. If a time limit has been set for this section of the test, you will notice a countdown timer on the Header of the screen, showing the amount of time remaining to complete this section of the test.

We recommend that you go to the practice version of this section of the test to learn more about how you should respond to items during this section of the test.

questions.questionText: What direction is the Fire House from the School?
What street crosses a river?
While obeying all traffic signs, what is the route with the shortest driving distance from the Post Office to the School?

options.text: Travel West on Pine, turn right on Laurel, turn right on Sycamore continue on to the School.
Travel West on Pine, turn left on Sycamore continue on to the School.
Travel West on Pine, turn right on Sycamore continue on to the School.
Travel East on Pine, turn left on Maple, turn left on Cedar to the School.

questions.questionText: While obeying all traffic signs, what is the quickest route from the Oak street exit of the Shopping Center to the Fire House?

options.text: Travel West on Oak, turn left on Elm, then turn left on Anita, then turn left on Redwood to the Fire House.
Travel West on Oak, turn right on Elm, then turn left on Anita, then turn left on Redwood to the Fire House.
Travel West on Oak, turn right on Elm, then turn left on Acacia, then turn right on Walnut, then turn left on Redwood to the Fire House.
Travel West on Oak, turn left on Sycamore, then turn right on Pine, then turn right on Walnut, then turn right on Redwood to the Fire House.

questions.questionText: A person is driving East on Cherry. After they make a left turn on Acacia, what direction are they traveling?
What street is the South entrance of the Shopping Center on?

While obeying all traffic signs, a person makes a left turn onto Plum street from the West side exit of the Court House. They then turn right onto Elm and then left onto AcaciA. Where are they located if they drive until Acacia street ends?

options.text: The corner of Elm and Acacia
The corner of Cherry and Acacia
The corner of Pine and Acacia

questions.questionText: You are driving a vehicle that is too heavy to drive on a one-way bridge. What would be the fastest route you can take to get from the Maple street exit of the Shopping Center to the Anita street entrance of the Court House, while obeying all traffic signs and not crossing a bridge?

options.text: Turn right onto Maple, turn right onto Oak, turn left onto Elm, turn right on Anita.
Turn right onto Maple, turn right onto Oak, turn right onto Elm, turn right on Anita.
Turn right onto Maple, turn left onto Pine, turn left onto Alder, turn right onto Ash, turn right onto Redwood, turn right on Anita.
Turn right onto Maple, turn right onto Pine, turn left onto Alder, turn right onto Ash, turn right onto Redwood, turn right on Anita.

questions.questionText: A man is driving on Laurel street and makes a right turn onto Sycamore. If he was driving while obeying all traffic signs, what direction would he now be traveling?
An ambulance needs to get to the Southwest corner of the Shopping Center. At what intersection is that location?

options.text: The Southwest corner of the Shopping Center is not located at an intersection.

questions.questionText: A police car is at the intersection of Plum and Anita and needs to get to the corner of Willow and Cedar. What route will the police car need to take to get there by traveling the least amount of distance while obeying all traffic signs?

options.text: Travel South on Plum, turn left on Elm, turn left on Oak, turn left on sycamore, turn right on Cedar.
Travel South on Plum, turn right on Elm, turn left on Oak, turn left on sycamore, turn left on Cedar.
Travel East on Anita, turn left on Elm, turn right on Oak, turn left on sycamore, turn right on Cedar.
Travel East on Anita, turn left on Elm, turn right on Oak, turn right on sycamore, turn right on Cedar.

questions.questionText: What direction can a car legally travel on Acacia street?

Starting at the Garage, if a person is traveling South on Sycamore and they obey all of the traffic signs, how many street intersections will that person cross before they come to the end of the street?
What direction should an ambulance head if they are at the corner of Cedar and Maple and they must get to the Post Office by the shortest route possible, while obeying all traffic signs?

There is an accident at the intersection of Acacia and Pine. You have two ambulances currently available, one located at the corner of Ash and Redwood and one located at the corner of Willow and Maple. Which ambulance would you send to minimize the distance that the ambulance has to travel to the accident while obeying all traffic signs?

options.text: The ambulance on the Northeast side of the river.
The ambulance on the Southwest side of the river.
It depends on the current level of traffic.
It will take an equal amount of distance for either ambulance to reach the accident.
